pages.text: $(#0BE334)Item Added In Simply More$(br2)$()The fang of a now deceased greatwrym, pulled out by the sage who killed it. Great Slither emits a warm sensation as it still has the greatwyrm's blood rushing through it. This blade retains the creature’s magical properties,
allowing it to conjure fangs from the ground, injecting deadly toxins throughout the victim’s body. The blade seems to shed its coat over time, always having a refreshed, sharp edge.
